value.title: Is your Power BI visualization misleading?
value.excerpt: Your Power BI visualization should communicate accurate information. However, you may be misleading your audience. Take care in what you are putting on your reports.  Download Sample: https://guyinacu.be/misleadingvisualsample  📢 Become a member: https://guyinacu.be/membership   *******************

value.title: IT Admin Takeover - Revisited!
value.excerpt: I take another look at how to take over a Shadow Tenant using the IT Admin Takeover process. value.title: Looking into the future of Power BI (2021)
